name: Patty's Pasta Salad
author: Patty H.
summary: I make this salad for almost every large family gathering I attend.  It is ALWAYS a great hit and there is seldom any left over.   It is a great pasta salad which can easily be made the day before. You can vary the ingredients by using fresh broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms, cucumbers, etc.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives, chopped
4 ounces sliced pepperoni sausage, each slice cut in half
directions: In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain
In a large bowl, combine the pasta, black olives, tomatoes, pepperoni, green olives, green onions and ham or turkey
Before serving, add shredded mozzarella and dressing
